import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link,NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { GetAccessToken, LogOutAction } from '../api/base'; import { LoginUserApi } from '../api/login/login'; import { AddtocardGet } from '../api/product/card'; import { GetAuthDetail } from '../layout/utils'; import Log from "../logo.png" export default function Header(prop){ const userAthantication = GetAuthDetail(); const userData = useSelector(state => state.Reducer2.data); const [cardData , setCardData] = useState([]); useEffect(async ()=>{ const access = GetAccessToken(); if(access){ const user = await LoginUserApi(userAthantication); } }) useEffect(() => { const fetchCardData = async () => { try { const cardDataApi = await AddtocardGet(userAthantication); if (cardDataApi.statusCode == 200) { setCardData(cardDataApi.data) console.log(cardData) } } catch (error) { console.error(error.message); } } fetchCardData(); }, []); return(
